Robert Hicks - Febraury, 2024 2
Chili Hicks, City Council Position 4

**Phone:**
360-629-2181
2024-2027
[Email Chili Hicks](mailto:robert.hicks@stanwoodwa.org)

Robert ‘Chili’ Hicks was elected to the City Council, position 4, starting a 4-year term in 2024. A North Carolina native, he enlisted in the U.S. Navy and attended Steam Propulsion Engineering school in Great Lakes, IL. Chili retired from the Navy as a Master Chief Petty Officer in 2006. During his first tour in Bremerton, he met his wife Cheryl, they moved back to Washington in 1998, settling in Stanwood to raise their three daughters. Chili and Cheryl now have five grandchildren.

He holds a Bachelor’s degree, a Master’s in Business Administration and is a graduate of the U.S. Navy Senior Enlisted Academy.  His community and public service include the Stanwood Planning Commission, Stanwood-Camano YMCA Board of Directors, Chairman, Stanwood City Council Planning Commission; YMCA youth coach, Drug Education for Youth Director, American Legion Post 92 & VFW Post 12228.

Chili enjoys spending time with family, friends and getting to know new people and see new places. He loves the Stanwood way of life and is honored to serve as city council member for the City of Stanwood.
